name: Mini Monster Mania
description:
Make your ultimate pet monster team. Match runes of magic to unleash your monster’s special powers. Reign Supreme in a legendary clash of monsters.

Get your new cute & cuddly creatures with magical characteristics. Create your own powerful monsters by fusing, mixing and evolving tiny monsters.

Play & Win exciting challenges & intense boss fights. Journey to mythic arenas and rule the realms as the Master of Monsters. Team up with your friends in quests and take on players worldwide for more fun and action.

FEATURES:
• 600+ mini monsters with unique skills
• 400+ levels
• 6 Monster categories – Dragon, Devil, Elemental, Nature, Aqua and Machine
• 5 levels of monster evolution – from Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic to Legendary monsters
• Strike with bombs and special attacks to deliver critical hits
• Player Vs Player battles, real-time, in an Arena
• Amazing attack animation and exhilarating sounds
